motherhood , not sexism , is the issue : in America , childless women earn almost as much as men , but mothers earn significantly less .这方面的问题不在于男性至上主义，而是女性的母亲身份使然：在美国，无子女的女性收入与男性相差无几，但有子女者赚的则少得多。

entry.def: Someone who is childless has no children.
